parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Map </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Draw a line on the map. Can decrease framerate!</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''drawLine''' [position1, position2, color] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [position1, position2, color]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position1: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]], [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> position2: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]], [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>([[findDisplay]] 12 [[displayCtrl]] 51) [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["Draw","
	(_this [[select]] 0) [[drawLine]] [
		[[getPos]] [[player]],
		[0,0,0],
		[0,0,1,1]
	];
"];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[drawArrow]], [[drawEllipse]], [[drawIcon]], [[drawRectangle]], [[drawPolygon]], [[drawTriangle]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
